title: "LexisPlotR"
output: html_document
---

LexisPlotR provides functins to plot Lexis Diagrams for Demographic purposes. 


## Load LexisPlotR
```{r}
library(LexisPlotR)
``` 

## Plotting a Lexis Grid
```{r}
lexisplotr(from_year=1900, to_year=1905, from_age=0, to_age=5)
``` 

## Emphasize the cohort 1901
```{r}
lexisplotr(from_year=1900, to_year=1905, from_age=0, to_age=5, cohort=1901)
``` 

## Emphasize the year 1902
```{r}
lexisplotr(from_year=1900, to_year=1905, from_age=0, to_age=5, year=1902)
``` 

## Emphasize the age 3
```{r}
lexisplotr(from_year=1900, to_year=1905, from_age=0, to_age=5, age=3)
```
